markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs=""
>
[Expert Snowcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=4101) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 185 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Gelid Shard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=201)

</column>

---

You draw ever more magical cold into your being, learning how to manipulate it to your whims. You gain the [expert spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170).
name: Expert Snowcasting
